snippet.title: Malum Incarnatum | Psychological Horror Game
snippet.description:
Available now for FREE: https://out-of-the-ordinary-world.itch.io/malum-incarnatum
Coming to Steam in 2025: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3348270/Carnal_Sins_Malum_Incarnatum__Carne_Vescens/

Descend into human hell and unravel a life torn apart by the desire to love and be loved. Even if this longing for love only leads to evil growing inside one man's heart.

"With the sin of the flesh every man is born, thus does each soul yearn for love. But should love be won but once and then lost, even the soul of a righteous heart may succumb to sin."
